name: premium_daily
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool daily_sec_financial_statement_dataset.
Tool description: While the "SEC Financial Statement Dataset" https://www.sec.gov/dera/data/financial-statement-data-sets.html is only provided after each quarter, this API provides the data in the same structure daily.

**Have a look at the tutorials on how to use the API**

**BETA**
This API is in beta, as I try to find out if there is demand for that data. During the beta phase, I will only update the data once or twice a week.

If you want to stay informed about the project or give me some feedback, please...
API description: This endpoints delivers the daily zip files of filed 10-q and 10-k reports. The files are published daily (resp. once or twice a week during the beta phase).

The structure of the data is similar as in the SEC financial statement dataset (https://www.sec.gov/files/aqfs.pdf), with the exception  that not TAG file is present and that the SUB file only contains a subset of the attributes.

Please not that the https-url has to end with a "/": 
https://daily-sec-financial-statement-dataset.p.rapidapi.com/premium

date.description: The date for which to fetch the report in YYYY-MM-DD format.
